name: STONEPUSHER
description:
I.

STONEPUSHER is a meditative puzzle game about the joys and sorrows of following a familiar path.

Slowly climb a mountain, re-discovering the landscape and its inhabitants. Solve triptychs of sliding block puzzles to reveal unsung histories. At the peak, rejoin your strange kin.

II.

This free demo contains a single triptych in a seaside biome. It is intended as a small vertical slice of a more complete experience.

If you enjoy it, please let me know! If you don't, please let me know (gently)! Yr feedback will help me decide how to grow things from here.

III.

NOTE: If you're not familiar with slider puzzles, you can read about how they work and one strategy for solving them. Personally, I like just pushing stuff around and seeing what sticks. For ease of access, STONEPUSHER also allows you to bypass puzzles, leaving a much shorter but hopefully still evocative story.
